name: WP Team Members
author: Md Abul Bashar

sections.description:
This is full responsive cb team members plugin for wordpress websites with shortcode support. shortcode is [cb-members].

Buy Pro Version only $5 Click Here

Full Docs

  1. Install this plugin “WP Team Members” You can download or search in your wordpress dashboard.
  2. active your plugin
  3. Add Team member name, description, upload image useing featured image.
  4. Now Create New page and input this plugin shortcode

  5. If you want to show customize ? then you can input count with shortcode, Now Show 4 Members but i have added 7 items. so if you want to show more or less just input your word.
    If you want to costomize column? then you can see bootsrtap grid
    just add cb_column then input your number, full codes cb_column=”6″, if you want to show 2 members per column then you can use 6, this is bootsrtap grid system, 12 is full width so 6+6=12 i mean show 2 members in per column, if you want to show 3 members lists in your per column then you can input 4, because 4+4+4=12, i mean show 3 members lists.

  6. If you want to change title “Our Powerful Team” then you can change just use another code. “cb_member_title” full code cb_member_title=”This is member title”

  7. If you want to change post type, just just posttype, but if you change this posttype then this not working perfectly.

  8. shortcodes lists

cb-members
count
cb_member_title
cb_column
Department = Pro Version
facebook-url
twitter-url
github-url
skype-user
position

OK, then for use our plugin with watching this video

Good Bye

Please subscribe our youtube channel: www.youtube.com/codingbank
www.youtube.com/linuxhostlab

Thanks

Premium Version Coming Soon with lot of feature and bio/resume support
sections.installation:
Full Docs

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Install this plugin “WP Team Members” You can download or search in your wordpress dashboard.
  2. active your plugin
  3. Add Team member name, description, upload image useing featured image.
  4. Now Create New page and input this plugin shortcode

  5. If you want to show customize ? then you can input count with shortcode, Now Show 4 Members but i have added 7 items. so if you want to show more or less just input your word.
    If you want to costomize column? then you can see bootsrtap grid
    just add cb_column then input your number, full codes cb_column=”6″, if you want to show 2 members per column then you can use 6, this is bootsrtap grid system, 12 is full width so 6+6=12 i mean show 2 members in per column, if you want to show 3 members lists in your per column then you can input 4, because 4+4+4=12, i mean show 3 members lists.

  6. If you want to change title “Our Powerful Team” then you can change just use another code. “cb_member_title” full code cb_member_title=”This is member title”

  7. If you want to change post type, just just posttype, but if you change this posttype then this not working perfectly.

  8. shortcodes lists

cb-members
count
cb_member_title
cb_column
Department = Pro Version
facebook-url
twitter-url
github-url
skype-user
position

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to install this plugin?

Just follow this information
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
